title: Litro unloads 3,900 MT of gas shipment
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro said it started unloading its latest gas shipment of 3,900 MT of domestic gas.
The Chairman of Litro, Thesara Jayasinghe said that steps were taken to distribute 100,000 gas cylinders daily during past three days.
He further said that a vessel carrying another stock of gas is scheduled to arrive to the country on Tuesday (12) as well.
However, there are still long queues at shops to obtain gas.
‘GotaGoGama’ protest village pops up as protestors occupy Galle Face
